sectionText: Get exclusive discounts, especially if you register through us
sectionText2: Get admission to private universities for free and within only 24 hours

contactUs.title: Register with us now
contactUs.subtitle: Let us contact you. We are available on

points.a: You can enlist the help of one of our team members to start your academic journey successfully.
points.b: Whatever your inquiry, rest assured that we will provide you with free consultation.
points.c: We guarantee admission to the best Turkish universities.
points.d: We are committed to providing our services in the best way.
points.e: We chart your academic future and support you until stability.
